Package foundation.omni.address

package foundation.omni.address
Experimental classes for Omni-specific addresses.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    foundation.omni
    OmniJ Core: Defines core Omni types like OmniValue and CurrencyID.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    OmniAddressMainNetParams
    EXPERIMENTAL Subclass of MainNetParams for generating Omni Addresses This is an experiment for POC Omni-specific addresses If we go ahead with this approach we should merge `OmniAddressMainNetParams` with `OmniMainNetParams`
    OmniAddressRegTestParams
    EXPERIMENTAL Subclass of RegTestParams for generating Omni Addresses
    OmniAddressTestNetParams
    EXPERIMENTAL Subclass of TestNet3Params for generating Omni Addresses
    OmniBase58LegacyAddressConverter
    EXPERIMENTAL 2-way Conversion between MAINNET Omni and BTC Addresses
    OmniSegwitAddressConverter
    Convert between Bitcoin and Omni Bech32 Segwit addresses Adds Omni networks to bitcoinj's Networks registry Bitcoin: bc1xxxx Omni: om1xxxx
